def plot_trend(game= "Counter-Strike"):
    game_df = df[df["Name"] == game]
    game_df = game_df.iloc[1:,:] # remove most recent
    game_df['Month'] = pd.to_datetime(game_df['Month'],format='%b-%y')
    game_df.set_index('Month', inplace=True)
    game_df.loc[game_df[game_df['Gain'] == '-'].index[0], 'Gain'] = np.nan
    game_df.loc[game_df[game_df['% Gain'] == '-'].index[0], '% Gain'] = np.nan
    game_df['Gain'] = game_df['Gain'].astype(float)
    game_df['% Gain'] = game_df['% Gain'].apply(lambda x: float(str(x).strip('%')))


    fig, ax = plt.subplots(2,2, figsize=(20,10), sharex=True)

    ind = 0

    cols = [game_df.columns[1]] + [game_df.columns[-1]] + list(game_df.columns[2:-1])

    for i in range(2):
        for j in range(2):
            ax[i, j].plot(game_df.index, game_df[cols[ind]])
            ax[i, j].set_ylabel(cols[ind])
            if i == 1:
                ax[i, j].set_xlabel("Year")
            ind += 1

    fig.suptitle(f"\nAnalysis on {game}\n", fontsize=16)

    plt.tight_layout(pad=0.3, w_pad=0.5, h_pad=0.3)
